document.discussion_title: Police Officer Recruit - Philadelphia Police Department
document.topic_text:
Police Officer Recruit Job - Philadelphia Police Department - Philadelphia, Pennsylvania April 25, 2016 Position Title: Police Officer Recruit Position Type: Civilian Closing Date: 5/20/2016 Job Description The City of Philadelphia is actively recruiting men and women for the position of Police Officer. Providing the highest quality of police service to improve the quality of life for the Citizens of Philadelphia while maintaininga high standard of professionalism, ethics and dedication to Law Enforcement. Please visit our website at: www.phillypolice.com for the online application. Additional Information The Philadelphia Police Department is the 4th Largest Department in the United States offering a lucrative benefit package with opportunites for advancement.
After completing the online application, applicants should contact the Recruitment Unit and ask for P/O Kenneth Scott by calling 215-227-8555 or e-mail at Kenneth.Scott@Phila.gov with your confirmation number from the completed application. Age At Least 19 years Education 60 College Credits or at least 6 months Military with an Honorable Discharge Experience None Required *Have a valid Drivers License *Must pass a medical examination, including a drug-screening test *Must passa background investigation *Veterans ust have an Honorable Discharge (General dischare with Honorable Conditions subject to case by case review *Applicant must pass a polygraph examination *Applicant must pass a psychological evaluation by a licensed pyschologist Entry Level Salary: $47,920 annual Academy Graduate: $51,245 annual Contact Information
